name: Anna

The pizza was good, the staff interaction makes it not so inviting to want to come back.

text: Nice concept of build your own pizza with house made pizza dough that has right amount of crunch. 180 seconds cook time is pretty fast and cooking it needs lot of practice so taking away one star as sometimes it gets burnt. Overall awesome experience...keepin' it real !!!

text: The crew is okay, topping choices are plentiful, & the pizza is what you'd expect... be careful asking for olive oil drizzle, they might add a bit much & make your pizza mushy.

text:
Misses The Mark
Blaze compares to MOD Pizza and other high heat fast pizza places. Most locations, including this one, are not well cleaned, employ disinterested staff and serve an underwhelming pizza.
